alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 28 at 8:10AM MDT until August 29 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH FOR WINDS AND RELATIVE HUMIDITY IN THE OWYHEE MOUNTAINS WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN IDAHO HIGHLANDS... .Southwest flow aloft will bring gusty winds to the area on Tuesday. The winds will combine with dry conditions potentially creating critical fire weather conditions. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS...WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423...424 AND 426... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * WINDS...15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...8 to 15 percent.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM
